mapper.insert: insert into reply_create(reply_num, id, reply_content, reply_grpno, reply_date) values((select nvl (max(reply_num),0)+1 from reply_create), #{id},#{reply_content}, (select nvl (max(reply_grpno),0)+1 from reply_create),sysdate)

insert into reply_create(reply_num, id, reply_content, reply_grpno, reply_indent,reply_ansnum,reply_date) values((select nvl (max(reply_num),0)+1 from reply_create),#{id},#{reply_content} ,#{reply_grpno},(select nvl (max(reply_indent),0)+1 from reply_create), (select nvl (max(reply_ansnum),0)+1 from reply_create),sysdate)
mapper.select: select reply_num, id, reply_content, reply_grpno, reply_indent,reply_ansnum,reply_date from reply_create where reply_num = #{reply_num}
